name: NATS Ltd
goal:
NATS is the UK's leading provider of air traffic control services. Each year we handle 2.4 million flights and 250 million passengers in UK airspace.
In addition to providing services to 14 UK airports, and managing all upper airspace in the UK, we provide services around the world spanning Europe, the Middle East, Asia and North America.
interests: Budget, Competition, Employment and Social Affairs, Environment, Research and innovation, Single market, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives:
Framework Regulation 549/2004
Service Provision Regulation (550/2004)
Single European Sky II (551/2004)
SES2+
Revision of EASA Basic Regulation 216/2008
Aviation Strategy
Airspace Architecture Project
